data.title: Pat Green in CONCERT!!!
data.meta_description: Join us to see the Texas legend, Pat Green in concert! He will be performing on June 22nd at 7pm, see you there!
data.text:
Get ready for an unforgettable night with Pat Green at Putters and Gutters Marble Falls! Doors open at 7:00 PM at The 19th Hole @ Putters and Gutters, located at 4100 N US Hwy 281, Marble Falls, Texas 78654. Don’t miss this chance to experience the music of a true Texas legend! Pat Green’s authentic blend of Southwestern country traditions and rock ‘n’ roll spirit has captivated audiences for over 25 years. His latest album, featuring hits like “Steady” and “I’m Going Home,” showcases his resilience and creative prowess. Join us for a night filled with Green’s signature sound and electrifying energy!

Venue information:

NEW: CLEAR BAG POLICY

No Re-Entry Policy for Putters and Gutters. Once entering The 19th Hole Venue, patrons are not permitted to leave Putters and Gutters and re-enter due to liability purposes. Patrons that exit Putters and Gutters will be required to give up their bracelet/lanyard and purchase admission if they decide to return.

THE VENUE is outside & covered.

Restrooms & ATMs are located in the skating rink and the arcade. Additional bathrooms are available outside the main building, near go-karts.

TICKETS ARE GENERAL ADMISSION, FIRST COME, FIRST SERVE. THEY MAY BE PURCHASED AT OUTHOUSETICKETS.COM. We have CHAIRS available.

VIP only upstairs.

For your convenience, tickets may be purchased before at outhousetickets.com. If arriving without tickets, they may be purchased at the bowling counter.

Extra parking is provided in the lot between Texas Building & Roofing Supplies, Inc. & Putters & Gutters.CARPOOL!

Concert food is available in the venue:

Pulled Pork Sandwich w/chips $8

Sausage Wrap w/chips $7

Chips and bagged snacks $1

A valid ID has to be present to drink alcohol.

There is no glass in the venue.

Smoking is prohibited in the venue.
